content: learn how to crochet the beautiful lace shawl it is comprised of single_crochet stitches and cluster shell stitches a free copy of this crochet pattern can be found on my blog https //richtexturescrochet com a free video tutorial can be found on my youtube channel https //www youtube com/c/richtexturescrochet/ skill level intermediate gauge 16 sts x 16 row of single_crochet = 4 inches finished size 63 x 21 inches yarn mandala ® tweed stripes by lion brand ® 100% acrylic 5 3 oz 150 g approx 426 yds 390 m worsted/medium weight 4 3 balls of colour buddha hook size i/9 5 5 mm hook adjust hook size if necessary to obtain correct gauge notions yarn needle
